It's draft day in the NFL and as general manager of the Cleveland Browns,
Sonny is forced to come up with a big move. After trading for the number one
pick, Sonny has to choose between a lower-ranked linebacker with a questionable
past or a celebrated quarterback with a questionable future. All the while,
Sonny is walking in the footsteps of his father and personal complications force
their way to the surface.
